title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.1 - Objectives of safety groups
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.1 - Objectives of safety groups

State Regulations

Such safety groups as may be formed or continued under this

Part shall at all times work toward: (a) the prevention of occupational accidents
and diseases and the formulation of a sound safety program; (b) the encouragement of improved medical
care of employees; and
(c) the
reduction of the cost of compensation insurance to members of safety groups. Incidental to these objectives is the encouragement of
members to assist in the proper handling of claims and payroll
information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
451.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
